resources.string:
Hello! I am Bang. 

I am 20 months old. I love to mum mum. I like trains. I have Thomas but no friends. Luckily, I also have Doraemon train.


My trains run on blue tracks and also run battery. The trains run in circles. Sometimes I will bring the trains out and let them run on the mat.


My grandmother takes good care of me. She makes sure I am clean everyday. She will showe r me and change my diaper. That's why my favourite number is 99.


My second favourite number is 3636.


Plarail is a long-running series of railroad toys which originated in Japan more than 50 years ago. Children can connect the rails and add scenery parts in any way they like, then run the trains on the tracks for unlimited hours of play.


Plarail is not the type of toy that children play with only once. They can build layouts limited only by their own imagination, then take their creation apart and redesign it, again and again. Plarail expands to offer challenges and fun for children at various stages of development, making Plarail a toy which can be enjoyed for many years.
